issue.title: Should Predicates be on Iter::value_type or Iter::reference?

discussion.p: Some algorithms, such as prev_permutation and next_permutation, are predicated on Iter::reference. Others, such as sort_heap, are predicated on Iter::value_type. I am not sure which is correct, but it the inconsistency seems strange. The choice should only affect proxy references.

resolution.p: Predicates operator on the value types, because predicates aren't supposed to change the actual value. This change has been made throughout the concepts proposals.
